title: Intermediate Filipino for Filipino Speakers
description: This course is designed to improve oral and written skills in the context of Filipino domestic culture. For students with basic proficiency in spoken and written Filipino, but who require improvement in basic grammar, word choice, punctuation, and spelling. LIHL 122F, LIHL 122W, and LIHL 122P may be taken in any order. Prerequisites: upper-division standing or consent of instructor; appropriate proficiency for level.
